response.original_title: 15 ค่ำเดือน 11 มหัศจรรย์บั้งไฟพญานาค
response.overview: Witness the miraculous spectacle of the full moon night, drawing people from all directions, brimming with faith and eager eyes. Amidst the enigmatic occurrences that defy explanation, we delve into the essence of creation, guided by the legendary tales of the wise, unveiling intricate truths for all to behold.
response.title: 15 ค่ำเดือน 11 มหัศจรรย์บั้งไฟพญานาค
